entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 12:36 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
